trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for Win32 safe handle implementations in which the value of either 0 or -1 indicates an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: 为 Win32 安全句柄实现提供基类，在这些实现中，值为 0 或 -1 都表示无效句柄。

trans-unit.source: This class derives from the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类从 <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle?displayProperty=nameWithType> 类派生。

trans-unit.source: It describes the format of an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: 它描述无效句柄的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, some handles use -1 as an invalid handle value, while others use 0.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某些句柄使用-1 作为一个无效句柄的值，而其他人使用 0。

trans-unit.source: Further derivations of this class (for example, file or registry handles) can specialize this further.
trans-unit.target: 此类 （例如，文件或注册表句柄） 的进一步派生可以进一步指定句柄。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle> class for an example of a class that derives from <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle>类派生自类的一个示例<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid>。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid> class whenever you need to safely wrap an unmanaged resource that does not have an existing managed wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid>无论何时需要安全地换行不具有现有非托管的资源的类托管包装。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to reliably release the handle during the finalization phase; <see langword="false" /> to prevent reliable release (not recommended).
trans-unit.target: 若要在终止阶段可靠地释放此句柄，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要阻止可靠释放（不建议使用），则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid" /> class, specifying whether the handle is to be reliably released.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeHandleZeroOrMinusOneIsInvalid" /> 类的新实例，并指定是否要可靠地释放句柄。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 对继承者的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示句柄是否无效。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is not valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果句柄无效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime uses this property to determine whether critical finalization is required.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时使用此属性来确定是否需要关键完成。
